computeEulerAngles

public static float[] computeEulerAngles(javax.vecmath.Matrix3f matrix)
Computes the Euler (YPR order) angles from the matrix. Check element [2][0] of matrix for rowFlag. Depending on the value of rowFlag the values of pitch, yaw and roll are computed as follows:
rowFlag = 1.0:
Y = atan2(-matrix[0][1], matrix[1][1]), P = -90.0, R = 0.0

rowFlag = -1.0:
Y = atan2(matrix[0][1], matrix[1][1]), P = 90.0, R = 0.0

otherwise:
Y = atan2(matrix[1][0], matrix[0][0]), P = asin(-matrix[2][0]), R = atan2(matrix[2][1], matrix[2][2])
